thread.section_title: Devon Valley Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing views
thread.title_full: Amazing views - Review of Devon Valley Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: GoldenOldie1954
title: Amazing views
text:
We stayed in a luxurious suite, sharing a pool with 5 other suites. Sheer bliss. The rooms were spacious and very well appointed. The bed was very comfortable. The staff were friendly and the service in the restaurant was very good. Highly recommended
Room Tip: Go for rooms 1 to 7 See more room tips
